titleStmt.title: An account of the sufferings of the French Protestants, slaves on board the French kings galleys by Elias Neau, one of their fellow sufferers ; together with a list of those who are still on board the said galleys.
titleStmt.author: Neau, Elias, b. ca. 1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Parker ... and sold by A. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
